item.title: The blogger who was right about Nvidia is now panning a $25 billion AI company
item.description: Jeffrey Emanuel, known for turning Wall Street’s attention to the risk DeepSeek might pose to Nvidia, warns that CoreWeave’s IPO is way overvalued.

item.title: The word from U.S. companies to Wall Street in new Trump era is ‘uncertainty’

item.title: This market sector is now most vulnerable to a crash. Nvidia investors, take note.

item.title: Social Security will stop mailing cards to 3 million people, report says. It could cause chaos at field offices.

item.title: We asked AI to fill out a March Madness bracket. It picked the type of Final Four that rarely happens.
item.description: The AI era has arrived for March Madness brackets. But is it any better than DIY?
